name: backlog-md-demo
description: A static HTML5 demo page for backlog.md CLI tool

scripts.build: echo 'No build step needed for static HTML'
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop backlog-md-demo-nginx && docker rm backlog-md-demo-nginx
scripts.jobs:demo: node -e "const JobManager = require('./background-jobs'); const manager = new JobManager(); manager.addJob('data-processing', {steps: 50}); manager.addJob('file-operation', {files: 15}); manager.addJob('api-call', {calls: 8}); console.log('Demo jobs added! Run npm run jobs to monitor them.');"
scripts.jobs:monitor: node -e "const JobCLI = require('./job-cli'); const cli = new JobCLI(); cli.monitorJobs();"

author: DevOps Team
